text: hello, I’m working on a progress icon… using AnimationDrawable… it should loop a set of frames, all alpha enabled gifs… I’ve marked android:oneshot=“false” property in the <animation-list> element of the progress.xml… I’m also using a handler post() to start this animation loop in the end of the onCreate method… but the background of the image keeps flashing when it loops. Do you guys know what could be happening?
Anyone ever had a OOM exception when opening soft-keyboard?
